item.name: F-Zero
item.appendix: This mode makes the F key (yes, the vanilla F key) enter a separate mode when held.
It's useful to add another layer to your keyboard with a super-easy key.
item.autogen: __HoldingKeyToKey__ KeyCode::F, KeyCode::F, KeyCode::VK_NONE, KeyCode::VK_MODIFIER_EXTRA2
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::H, ModifierFlag::EXTRA2, KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::EXTRA2, KeyCode::CURSOR_DOWN
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::EXTRA2, KeyCode::CURSOR_UP
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::EXTRA2, KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT

item.name: Programmer Settings
item.appendix: This mode emulates a few handy shortcuts for programmers

item.name: Shifts to Parentheses
item.appendix: When pressed alone, Left Shift types left paren (
When pressed alone, Right Shift types right paren )
When used with other keys, they're normal Shifts.
item.modifier_not: ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_R, ModifierFlag::FN, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R,
item.autogen: __KeyToKey__ KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L,
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::SHIFT_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L,
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L,
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R,

item.name: Shifts to Parentheses Losh
item.appendix: Shifts, when pressed alone, type parentheses.
When used with other keys they're normal shifts.
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::SHIFT_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SHIFT_L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SHIFT_R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_9, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::KEY_0, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::SPACE

item.name: Options to Angle Brackets
item.appendix: When pressed alone, Left Option types less symbol <
When pressed alone, Right Option types greater symbol >
When used with other keys, they're normal Options.
item.autogen: __KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::DOT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::OPTION_L, KeyCode::COMMA, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::CAPSLOCK, KeyCode::OPTION_R, KeyCode::DOT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::CAPSLOCK, KeyCode::OPTION_L, KeyCode::COMMA, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_R, KeyCode::DOT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::COMMA, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::OPTION_R, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L, KeyCode::COMMA, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::DOT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: Commands to Mustaches
item.appendix: When pressed alone, Left Command types {
When pressed alone, Right Command types }
When used with other keys, they're normal Commands.
item.autogen: __KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::NONE, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::CAPSLOCK, KeyCode::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
__KeyOverlaidModifier__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::CAPSLOCK, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_R, KeyCode::DOT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::BRACKET_LEFT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::COMMAND_R, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L, KeyCode::COMMA, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::BRACKET_RIGHT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L

item.name: Space Cadet Mode
item.appendix: This mode emulates a few of the features of the Space Cadet keyboard.
It also adds a few other helpful mappings.
It requires the Unicode Hex Input keyboard layout for the Greek and Math layers.

item.name: Force yourself to use the correct shift keys.
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::Q, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::W, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::E, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::R, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::T, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::A, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::S, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::D, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::G, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::Z, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::X, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::V, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::Y, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::U, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::I, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::O, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::P, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::H, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::J, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::K, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::L, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::SEMICOLON, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::N, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::M, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::COMMA, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::DOT, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::QUOTE, ModifierFlag::SHIFT_R, KeyCode::VK_NONE

item.name: Remap Held Tab to Hyper
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper. This maps Held Tab to Control + Shift + Option + Command.
You can use this key in your own custom keyboard shortcuts you create in apps.
item.autogen:
--KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::TAB, ModifierFlag::NONE,
KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L,
KeyCode::TAB

item.name: Remap LEADER
item.appendix: Simultaneous keys presses to Vim LEADER aka NO_BREAK_SPACE
(E+R to LEADER)
(U+I to LEADER)
item.autogen: __SimultaneousKeyPresses__ KeyCode::E, KeyCode::R, KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L
__SimultaneousKeyPresses__ KeyCode::U, KeyCode::I, KeyCode::SPACE, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L

item.name: Remap Left Control to Hyper
item.appendix: OS X doesn't have a Hyper. This maps Left Control to Control + Shift + Option + Command.
You can use this key in your own custom keyboard shortcuts you create in apps.
If held down and pressed with anohter key, it acts like (ctrl+shift+cmd+opt)
Pressed and released on its own, send escape
item.autogen: --KeyOverlaidModifier-- KeyCode::F19, KeyCode::COMMAND_L, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L
__KeyToKey__ KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::COMMAND_L | ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L, KeyCode::C, ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L,

item.name: Restore [Shift-]Opt-(Left/Right)
item.appendix: The Unicode Hex Input keyboard layout disables these keys for some reason.
item.autogen:
--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, VK_OPTION | VK_SHIFT,
KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CURSOR_LEFT, VK_OPTION,
KeyCode::B, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_OPTION | VK_SHIFT,
KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::SHIFT_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

--KeyToKey-- KeyCode::CURSOR_RIGHT, VK_OPTION,
KeyCode::F, ModifierFlag::OPTION_L | ModifierFlag::CONTROL_L

item.name: Math Layer
item.appendix: Right Control key activates the Math key layer.

item.name: Greek Layer
item.appendix: Right PC Application key activates the Greek key layer.
item.autogen: --KeyToKey-- KeyCode::PC_APPLICATION, KeyCode::VK_STICKY_EXTRA4
